name: Gum Gum Giant
text: Don!!-2: You may trash one card from your hand: If your leader has the {Straw Hat Crew} type, give up to one of your leader or characters +4000 power for this battle. Then, draw 2 cards.

effect.text: You may trash one card from your hand: If your leader has the {Straw Hat Crew} type, give up to one of your leader or characters +4000 power for this battle. Then, draw 2 cards.
conditions: your leader has the {Straw Hat Crew} type

meta.notes: Card has a 'SAMPLE' watermark, which is not part of the official card text. The Counter value is 2000, not 2 as might be misread from the icon.
